#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
//#include<conio.h>
int main()
{
    //freopen("peer.txt","r",stdin);
    int a[105][105],sum,count,count1,row,col;
    int t,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%d",&n);
              count=0;count1=0;
              for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
              {
                      sum=0;
                      for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
                      {
                              scanf("%d",&a[i][j]);
                              sum+=a[i][j];
                      }
                      if(sum%2==1)
                      {
                      count++;
                      row=i;
                      }
              }
                  for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
                  {
                      sum=0;
                      for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
                      sum+=a[j][i];
                      if(sum%2==1)
                      {
                      count1++;
                      col=i;
                      }
                  }
                  if(count==0&&count1==0)
                  printf("1\n");
                  else if(count==1&&count1==1)
                  printf("(%d,%d)\n",row,col);
                  else
                  printf("0\n");
              }
    
   //getch();
}
